bike.description: Safire M5 alloy frame, women's tubesets and XC Trail geometry, tapered HT, DMD front derailleur, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, replaceable derailleur hanger, disc only, bolt-on cable guides with Brain mount on SS, 120mm travel

Specialized Future Shock S140TA, Spike Valve damper, tapered carbon steer/crown, comp and rebound adj., low bearing mount, 140/115mm travel adjust
1-1/8 and 1-1/2" Threadless, Campy style upper with 1-1/2" lower, cartridge bearings
Specialized XC, 3D forged alloy, 4-bolt, 31.8mm clamp, adjustable rise
Specialized XC low-rise bar, 7050 butted alloy, 680mm wide, 8º backsweep, 6º upsweep, 31.8mm
Women's Enduro lock-on
Custom Avid Elixir 7 SL, hydraulic disc, pad contact & reach adj., alloy backed semi-metallic pad, stainless hardware, 160mm rotor

Custom Avid Elixir 7 SL hydraulic, tool-less reach and pad contact adj., alloy lever blade

36/22, w/ carbon guard
